s.text: Notes left by Barton in the apartment where his second wife and two children were found dead shed light on the motives behind his killing spree: estrangement from his wife, recent massive day trading losses, and a strange allusion to a "fear" passed from his father, to him, and ultimately to his son.
All three papers also front coverage of the fallout: increased scrutiny of day trading ( NYT , LAT , WP ) and renewed clamoring in the House for tighter gun control ( WP , reefered by the LAT ).
